唔係講大話即係咩?

仲有澳Victoria學神車牌﹐
旅遊簽證都可以去考架wor。
唔洗一定讀書都可以考。
淨係考個multiple choice試。

https://www.tripadvisor.com/ShowTopic-g255055-i120-k8017533-Postal_Address_for_long_term_traveller-Australia.html

Their solution was to pick a caravan park, and have them write up a short term rental agreement (one month), which was enough for a drivers licence
地址證明攞求其揾個地方簽租約一個月都可以。

所以證明唔倒你係係澳洲讀過書wor。

仲有另一個post自稱30幾歲人係讀澳洲讀高中。
Secondary school students are aged between 12 and 20 years old.
https://www.study.vic.gov.au/en/study-in-victoria/victoria's-school-system/Pages/default.aspx
